    • search

      @ResponseBody @RequestMapping("/control/user/search") public String search(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model, PageForm pageForm, Integer searchType, Integer userTypeCode, String keyword, String start_point, String end_point, String start_registrationDate, String end_registrationDate, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception
      搜索用户列表
      参数:
      model -
      pageForm -
      userTypeCode - 查询用户类型
      keyword - 关键词
      start_point - 起始积分
      end_point - 结束积分
      start_registrationDate - 起始注册日期
      end_registrationDate - 结束注册日期
      request -
      response -
      queryType - 查询类型
      start_deposit - 起始预存款
      end_deposit - 结束预存款
      start_buyTotalAmount - 起始已购买商品总金额
      end_buyTotalAmount - 结束已购买商品总金额
      返回:
      抛出:
      Exception
